comment: During the pandemic, she stayed accessible at all times. She's understanding and provides quality feedback. Would recommend.

I was a little apprehensive at first, but, as the semester progressed, I actually found myself learning a good bit of info about the scientific and psychological aspects of leadership. Dr. Pooler was very understanding during the trying times (COVID-19) and genuinely cared about our success in the class.
Understand the balance of school and personal responsibilities. Great professor!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: So, this teacher was awesome during the pandemic. She made our class easier to deal with, knowing other classes would be more tough. She gave us easy tests where you did have to read the book, but it wasn't much work! Most of my grades were 100s because she's an easy grader, but I also put in the work.

We have a weekly discussion, different topic each week. I was able to relate my own experience and share it with my class. The class does require us to reply to several classmates to get the full point.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I LOVED this professor! Dr. Pooler is very helpful and gives great feedback. Had her during the pandemic and she was VERY understanding and helpful! Best teacher I had all semester
Great professor weekly discussion, and 2 papers and a presentation. Super lenient grading, and she is understanding

The assignments are usually reading a chapter, completing a discussion, and taking a chapter quiz. Other assignments are the mid-term and the final paper and presentation. This professor gives really great feedback and I can tell that she took a lot of time giving good feedback on each discussion and assignment. The course had good pacing.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Professor Pooler was very engaged in her responses. Even though it was a online course she was very personable. Awesome at accommodating students with given circumstances. One of the best online teachers yet.

If I could take Dr. Pooler for every online class I would!! She grades everything SO FAST! She literally puts grades in that night or the following morning. She cares about her students and wants everyone to do well. If you complete your work on time there's no reason you shouldn't get an A in this class! TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!!!

Dr. Pooler is great. She gives timely feedback as well as keeping up with her grades. Always available to answer questions. Quizzes are easy. Just make sure you put some thought into your discussion posts and writing assignments and it is an easy A.
Great teacher, very supportive.

Dr. Pooler is an example of a professor who cares. She is understanding and truly aims to see her students succeed. She demonstrates this by making herself available and providing good feedback. I have the class online, and it's well structured while still allowing us to communicate effectively. I'm glad I took this class and am gaining so much

She is such a good teacher! I am currently taking the class as an elective and it has been a smooth sail with Dr. Pooler. In case you are not sure of what to do, email her and she responds in a blink of an eye.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Pooler was one of the best professors! She gave great feedback in a timely manner. None of the work was too difficult or heavy. As long as you put in the effort on every assignment, then you should easily make an A. I would highly recommend taking her if you can!
Professor Pooler is an amazing teacher. Her Work load is manageable. Textbook is required. She's very understanding , caring, and helpful. Her lectures are fun and interactive.
Excellent and understand teacher! Not too much busy work and her assignments were useful to the class and not just busy work!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: A good teacher with excellent feedback. I appreciated the scope of the assignments and their utility. I took Senior Seminar and it certainly refined my toolbag moving forwards. A worthwhile course, in which you will be rewarded for your diligence. Recommended.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Pooler was an amazing professor! I took her online leadership class and honestly if you just do the work and show that you are putting in effort to learn, she will help you succeed and you will pass! Highly recommend taking her class, even if you have never taken an online class. She will give you all the material to do well!
I enjoyed Dr. Pooler! She wants you to succeed and will work with you if you communicate with her. If you stay on track and do the work it's an Easy A.

Professor Pooler is a great instructor. I enjoyed taking her class. She made the material easy to understand. All of her quizzes were open book, so, I suggest that you purchase the text book. The discussions were highly insightful as well. I highly encourage you take professor Pooler's leadership course. You wont regret it one bit.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: She was so sweet and lovely!! There's no reason you can't get an A in this course.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Pooler was the perfect professor. You can tell she cares about her students and that they do well in her class. She is clear on what is due on what days. The class was about as well organized as you can ask for an online class.

Dr. Pooler is very understand and truly cares about her students doing well. I fell behind with the assignments and she was very understand and allowed me to catch up! Highly Recommend! Took it online. Quiz for each chapter along with a discussion post. Two papers, although the 1st paper is part of the 2nd and presentation along with your 2nd paper

I took LDRS3000 online. Dr. Pooler is very understanding and is very clear on her expectations. There is one quiz on each chapter and 2 exams. No lockdown browser as you are expected to use your book. I HIGHLY recommend using the electronic version of the book (with the find feature, thank me later). I highly recommend taking her!

I loved taking this online class. There were a lot of assignments throughout the week but it was not difficult completing them because quiz and discussion board questions were always directly related to the lecture.

Dr. Pooler is a nice woman, but she's new at teaching & still hasn't gotten the hang of it. Her class is disorganized; she hasn't lectured or facilitated the class this entire semester. Every class is group presentations where students do a sub-par job at summarizing chapters in the textbook. The exam content is seemingly random; hard to prepare.

Dr Pooler is very inspiring and she will go out of her way to work with you. Recommend developing a relationship with her. Tests are fairly easy. Not lecture heavy and a lot of group work required in this course
Dr. Pooler is a new professor, so she was a bit all over the place this semester, but she's a super cool lady who gives her students countless opportunities to succeed. Easy A for sure!
